imdb.plot outline: This high-energy program efficiently integrates an intense cardio workout with strength building elements. And all of it is achieved while on or holding your Balance Ball . Follow along with Tanja as she alternates between challenging cardio intervals and targeted strength-building sequences focusing on upper body, lower body and core.
imdb.title: Gaiam: Cardio Burn Balanceball
plot: 10, 30 and 50-minute intensive cardio sequences combined with strength building for total body conditioning.

This high-energy program efficiently integrates an intense cardio workout with strength building elements. And all of it is achieved while on or holding your Balance Ball . Follow along with Tanja as she alternates between challenging cardio intervals and targeted strength-building sequences focusing on upper body, lower body and core.
